location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to George Skipp, at Shiraz

mods.abstract: The bulk of the letter relates to the ongoing disagreement with Sheik Nassir [Sheikh NƒÅsir] over the factory rent at Bushire. It is also reported that the Revengeand the Eaglehave joined the expedition fleet off Carrack [Kharg Island].
